import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { Container, AppBar, Typography, Grow, Grid } from "@material-ui/core" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { getPosts } from "./actions/posts" import Posts from "./components/Posts/Posts" import Form from "./components/Form/Form" import memories from "./images/memories.png" import useStyles from "./styles" const App = () => { const [currentId, setCurrentId] = useState(null) const classes = useStyles() const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(getPosts()) }, [dispatch, currentId]) return ( Memories
) } export default App
